DOC.brief_summary: This is a phase II study where chemotherapy (gemcitabine) is given into the urinary bladder.
DOC.brief_title: Intravesical Chemotherapy Treatment of Superficial Bladder Cancer
DOC.criteria: Superficial bladder cancer No prior chemotherapy Grade 3 tumors Papillary tumors invading connective tissue Significant urologic disease, possible interfering with intravesical therapy
